meanings.definition: The opinions or commentary of a pundit.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy listening to the punditries on the radio.
meanings.sent2: Her punditries on the latest political issues are always insightful.
meanings.sent3: The cat's punditries on the best sleeping spots in the house are quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: His punditries on fashion trends were as colorful as a rainbow.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's punditries on the importance of reading were truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The act of making comments or expressing opinions as a pundit.
meanings.sent1: Engaging in punditries requires a good understanding of the topic.
meanings.sent2: His punditries during the debate were well-received by the audience.
meanings.sent3: The dog's punditries on the best treat flavors were quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her punditries on the economy were like a beacon of light in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The scientist's punditries on climate change were backed by solid research.
